name: reldmdsmm

stmt.origin: reldmmpt2(hs0, hs1, cdsmm, universe, universe, co(co(cv(hs0), cprds, cv(hs1)), cress, crab(hs3, cixp(hs2, cdm(cv(hs1)), cfv(cbs, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))), wcel(crab(hs2, cdm(cv(hs1)), wne(cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs2)), cfv(c0g, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), cfn))))
stmt.pretty: reldmmpt2(hs0, hs1, cdsmm, universe, universe, ((hs0[×]hs1)[|`s]{ hs3 ∈ ×(hs2 ∈ dom(hs1),(Base `(hs1 ` hs2)))| { hs2 ∈ dom(hs1)|(hs3 ` hs2)≠(0 `(hs1 ` hs2))} ∈ Fin }))

body.origin:
|- wrel(cdm(cdsmm))
-| wceq(cdsmm, cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, co(co(cv(hs0), cprds, cv(hs1)), cress, crab(hs3, cixp(hs2, cdm(cv(hs1)), cfv(cbs, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))), wcel(crab(hs2, cdm(cv(hs1)), wne(cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs2)), cfv(c0g, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), cfn)))))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffsc(hs1, universe)
body.pretty:
⊢ Rel(dom((+)m))
⊣ (+)m =(hs0 ∈ 𝕌, hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦((hs0[×]hs1)[|`s]{ hs3 ∈ ×(hs2 ∈ dom(hs1),(Base `(hs1 ` hs2)))| { hs2 ∈ dom(hs1)|(hs3 ` hs2)≠(0 `(hs1 ` hs2))} ∈ Fin }))
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)
⊣ d(hs1, 𝕌)
